Kayako - ticket id 60238514 // Shaquille De Lancy commented publicly: Dear David,

Thank you for following up on this issue.

We've noticed that there is already a very similar number on your account:  5512175999 as opposed to 5512175899.
This number also matches the current username of Winston Hosang's account.

image

Could you please confirm which of the following is the correct number?

	* 5512175999, which is currently on your company account and seems to be intended for Winston Hosang based on the configuration of his account.

	* If this is correct, Winston Hosang can activate StreetSmart on his device right now using 5512175999 as the phone number and 69012 as their PIN.

	* 5512175899, which is a new number that would be added to your account.

	* If this is correct, please let us know. We will add this number to your account as well.

Once you've confirmed, we'll be happy to take the required actions. We look forward to hearing from you again.

Best regards,
Shaquille De Lancy
StreetSmart Support Team

This ticket will stay open for one week unless you reply with "This ticket can be closed" or update the status to Completed in the portal. We will write to you again to remind you.

Kayako - ticket id 60238514 // Shaquille De Lancy commented publicly: Dear David,

Greetings from the StreetSmart Support Team! This ticket was created on your behalf to fulfill a device activation request associated with your Company ID 88704 and the phone number 973-248-5786.

We've completed this request, and you can now see the device listed in the Administration > Devices section of the Web Portal.

image

The worker can now Activate Their Mobile Application [https://streetsmart-supportdesk.kayako.com/article/62617-activating-mobile-application] using their assigned phone number as well as their PIN to start using StreetSmart.
If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to reach out; we'd be happy to help.

Best regards,
Shaquille De Lancy
StreetSmart Support Team

This ticket will stay open for one week unless you reply with "This ticket can be closed" or update the status to Completed in the portal. We will write to you again to remind you.

Kayako - ticket id 60238514 // Cu Chulainn AI Manager commented privately: ===== Operation Summary =====
The process has failed and andon cord has been pulled for the following reason:

**Unexpected backend error during device addition. Context: Request is to add a single device only for INDUSTRIAL WASTE TECHNOLO (COID 88704). Phone number provided: 973 248 5786 (normalized to 9732485786). No removals requested. Customer noted payment via Stripe. Action taken: Called AuxiliaryAgent.streetsmart_add_devices_list with action='adddevice_action', requester_email='dobrien@iwt-inc.com' (assumed company admin), Request='Please add the following device to StreetSmart for company INDUSTRIAL WASTE TECHNOLO (COID: 88704). Phone number to activate: 9732485786. Payment has been completed via Stripe.' Result: status_message='adddevice_action is completed.' but private_message indicates an unexpected error: 'Processed by Internal Lambda : Unexpected error, or Error parsing CompanyID or Phonelist, CompanyID: 88704, phoneList: 9732485786. Exception: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'get''; public_message was empty. This error is not one of the expected failure cases (not-admin, already added, or no licenses). Requesting human investigation of the internal lambda failure, validation that 'dobrien@iwt-inc.com' is an admin for COID 88704, and guidance on whether a different request format or retry is needed before contacting the customer.**

Please review the ticket details and process the request manually.
===== End of Summary =====
